text: Hakkı Yıldız (born 12 December 1995) is a Turkish-German footballer who plays as a forward for Niğde Anadolu. ==References== ==External links== * Profile at DFB.de * Profile at TFF.org * Profile at kicker.de * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nördlingen Category:Footballers from Bavaria Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:German footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Erzgebirge Aue players Category:SpVgg Greuther Fürth II players Category:Darıca Gençlerbirliği footballers Category:Keçiörengücü footballers Category:3. title: Hakkı Yıldız
